subject: Office Of The Senate Preside
body:
Office Of The Senate President - Abuja
Senator Godwin Akpabio GCON
National Assembly Complex, Three Arms Zone,
P.M.B, 141, FCT, Abuja,
ON PAID CONTRACT PAYMENT THE SUM OF TEN MILLION SEVEN HUNDRED AND
FIFTY THOUSAND UNITED STATES DOLLARS ONLY
Dear Sir,
I wish to use this opportunity and time the 16th of June 2023 to let
you know that  i Senator Godwin Akpabio GCON is  the new Senate
President Federal Republic of Nigeria.
I  come across your contract registration number on your
CBN/FMF/NNPC/00-9  file no  this morning the sum of Ten Million Seven
Hundred Thousand United Stated Dollars Only which was not release to
your account since 2009 till date.
I want to use this  opportunity  to let you know that i will use my
power as the new Senate President Federal Republic of Nigeria to make
sure that your fund will be release to your account if you can be able
to send to me your following details for the transfer below:
Your Full Name:
Your Address:
Your Working Cellphone/Telephone No:
Your International passport/ Your Id Card back and front
WIRE TRANSFER INFORMATIONAL DETAILS BELOW:
Your Bank Name:
Your Bank Address:
Your Account No:
Bank Swift Code:
Bank Routing No:
Moreover, the new President Federal Republic of Nigeria Mr Bola Tinubu
has sign and approved the release of all contract payment that is
pending since the year 2009 till date that must be released to the
owner's which your name is among those that will receive the fund this
week if you should send all your details to me today to this e-mail
address (
godwinakpabio5@gmail.com
)
Thank i hope to read from you soon
Senator Godwin Akpabio GCON
Senate President Federal Republic of Nigeria
+234 916-808-5378

subject: Re:   Office Of The Senate Preside
body:
Hello Senator Godwin Akpabio GCON,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite surprised to hear about this contract payment. Could you please provide more details about this contract? How did my name come up in your files? 

I'm also curious about the process of releasing these funds. What steps would need to be taken on my end?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Bessie
